885040.name: Monster RPG 3 Soundtrack
885040.description:
The sounds in Monster RPG 3, including this soundtrack, are mostly synthesized as the game plays from simple text descriptions. The size of the soundtrack in the Monster RPG 3 download is therefore just a few kilobytes. The MP3s in this DLC have been recorded from those text descriptions for convenience.

New


This DLC now includes an NES ROM version of the soundtrack playable in an emulator. You can find it in the Monster RPG 3 Soundtrack folder in your Steam installation.
885040.supported_languages:
法语*, 英语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 阿拉伯语*, 保加利亚语*, 捷克语*, 丹麦语*, 荷兰语*, 芬兰语*, 希腊语*, 匈牙利语*, 日语*, 韩语*, 挪威语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 罗马尼亚语*, 俄语*, 简体中文*, 瑞典语*, 泰语*, 繁体中文*, 土耳其语*, 乌克兰语*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*, 越南语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
